name: htslib
description: C library for high-throughput sequencing data formats

bzip2.description: Enable support for BZ2-compressed CRAM files

curl.description: Enable libcurl-based support for http/https/etc URLs

gcs.description: Enable support for Google Cloud Storage URLs

lzma.description: Enable support for LZMA-compressed CRAM files

s3.description: Enable support for Amazon AWS S3 URLs
